protocol_name: TruSeq RNA kit protocol (with one-third reaction volumes and some minor changes)
protocol_name_html: TruSeq RNA kit protocol (with one-third reaction volumes and some minor changes)
authors: Anitha Jayaprakash, Jaehee Shim, and Ravi Sachidanandam

components.data: If not performing Poly A select mRNA, proceed directly to step 24.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If not performing Poly A select mRNA, proceed directly to step 24.

components.data: Mix 500 ng total RNA and dH2O to a final volume of 16.67 uL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix 500 ng total RNA and dH2O to a final volume of 16.67 uL.

components.data: Vortex RNA purification Beads and add 16.67 uL to RNA sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vortex RNA purification Beads and add 16.67 uL to RNA sample.

components.data: Mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data:
Incubate in thermocycler:

65 °C 5 min
4 °C hold
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Incubate in thermocycler:

65 °C 5 min
4 °C hold

components.data: When thermocycler reaches 4 °C remove sample and place on bench at room temperature for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When thermocycler reaches 4 °C remove sample and place on bench at room temperature for 5 min.

components.data: Place sample in magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place sample in magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Remove and discard all the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard all the supernatant.

components.data: Remove sample from rack.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove sample from rack.

components.data: Add 66.7 uL of Bead Washing Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 66.7 uL of Bead Washing Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Place the sample back in the magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the sample back in the magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Remove and discard all of the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard all of the supernatant.

components.data: Add 16.67 uL of Elution Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 16.67 uL of Elution Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data:
Incubate in thermocycler:

 80 °C  2 min
 25 °C  hold
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Incubate in thermocycler:

 80 °C  2 min
 25 °C  hold

components.data: Remove sample from thermocycler when it reaches 25 °C and keep at room temp.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove sample from thermocycler when it reaches 25 °C and keep at room temp.

components.data: Add 16.67 uL of Bead Binding Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 16.67 uL of Bead Binding Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.

components.data: Place sample in magnetic separator for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place sample in magnetic separator for 5 min.

components.data: Remove and discard all supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard all supernatant.

components.data: Remove sample from rack.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove sample from rack.

components.data: Add 66.7 uL of Bead Washing Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 66.7 uL of Bead Washing Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Place sample in magnetic separator for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place sample in magnetic separator for 5 min.

components.data: Remove and discard all supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard all supernatant.

components.data:
Add 6.5 uL Elute, Prime, Fragment Mix and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

If proceeding directly from step 1, add total RNA to 6.5 uL of Elute, Prime, and Fragment mix, and bring up the total volume to no more than 10 uL with dH2O.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add 6.5 uL Elute, Prime, Fragment Mix and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

If proceeding directly from step 1, add total RNA to 6.5 uL of Elute, Prime, and Fragment mix, and bring up the total volume to no more than 10 uL with dH2O.

components.data:
Incubate in thermocycler:
94 °C 8 min
4 °C hold

If not performing Poly A select mRNA, proceed directly to step 28.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Incubate in thermocycler:
94 °C 8 min
4 °C hold

If not performing Poly A select mRNA, proceed directly to step 28.

components.data: Place sample in a magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place sample in a magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Transfer 5.67 uL of the supernatant to a new 0.2 mL PCR tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 5.67 uL of the supernatant to a new 0.2 mL PCR tube.

components.data: Add 2.67 uL of First Strand Master Mix / Super Script II mix to sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 2.67 uL of First Strand Master Mix / Super Script II mix to sample.

components.data:
Incubate in thermocycler:

25 °C 10 min
42 °C 50 min
70 °C 15 min
4 °C hold
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Incubate in thermocycler:

25 °C 10 min
42 °C 50 min
70 °C 15 min
4 °C hold

components.data: Add 8.33 uL of Second Strand Master Mix to sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 8.33 uL of Second Strand Master Mix to sample.

components.data: Incubate in thermocycler at 16 °C for 1 hour.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate in thermocycler at 16 °C for 1 hour.

components.data: Remove sample from thermocycler and let warm to room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove sample from thermocycler and let warm to room temperature.

components.data: Add 30 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP beads and mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 30 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP beads and mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 15 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at room temperature for 15 min.

components.data: Place on magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place on magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Remove and discard 45 uL of the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard 45 uL of the supernatant.

components.data: Keep sample in magnetic rack and add 200 uL of 80% ethanol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Keep sample in magnetic rack and add 200 uL of 80% ethanol.

components.data: Incubate for 30 seconds.  Remove and discard all supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 30 seconds.  Remove and discard all supernatant.

components.data: Repeat steps 37 and 38 once more for a total of two washes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat steps 37 and 38 once more for a total of two washes.

components.data: Add 22 uL Resuspension Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 22 uL Resuspension Buffer and pipet up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.

components.data: Place in magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place in magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Transfer 20 uL of the supernatant to a new 0.2 mL PCR tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 20 uL of the supernatant to a new 0.2 mL PCR tube.

components.data: Add 13.3 uL of End Repair Mix to sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 13.3 uL of End Repair Mix to sample.

components.data: Incubate at 30 °C for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 30 °C for 30 min.

components.data: Add 53.5 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP Beads and mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 53.5 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP Beads and mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 15 min.
components.name: Description

components.data: Place on magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place on magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Incubate for 30 seconds.  Remove and discard all supernatant.
components.name: Description

components.data: Repeat steps 50 and 51 once more for a total of two washes.
components.name: Description

components.data: Add 7.83 uL Resuspension buffer and mix by pipetting up and down until beads are in a homogenous suspension.
components.name: Description

components.data: Transfer 5.83 uL of the supernatant to a new 0.2 mL PCR tube.
components.name: Description

components.data: Add 4.17 uL A-Tailing Mix to sample.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 4.17 uL A-Tailing Mix to sample.

components.data: Incubate at 37 °C for 30 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 37 °C for 30 min.

components.data:
Add
0.83 uL DNA Ligase Mix
0.83 uL Resuspension Buffer
0.83 uL RNA Adapter Index
and mix by pipet or flicking, and spin down.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add
0.83 uL DNA Ligase Mix
0.83 uL Resuspension Buffer
0.83 uL RNA Adapter Index
and mix by pipet or flicking, and spin down.

components.data: Incubate at 30 °C for 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 30 °C for 10 min.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1.67 uL Stop Ligase Mix.

components.data: Use 1 uL to determine number of cycles to perform in following PCR amplification.
components.name: Description

components.data:
Mix

6.67 uL Adapter ligated DNA from step 83
1.67 uL PCR Primer Cocktail
8.33 uL PCR Master Mix
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Mix

6.67 uL Adapter ligated DNA from step 83
1.67 uL PCR Primer Cocktail
8.33 uL PCR Master Mix

components.data:
Amplify with the following PCR procotol

 98 °C - 30 seconds
5 - 18 cycles 
98 °C - 10 seconds
60 °C - 30 seconds
72 °C - 30 seconds
72 °C - 5

hold at 4 °C
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Amplify with the following PCR procotol

 98 °C - 30 seconds
5 - 18 cycles 
98 °C - 10 seconds
60 °C - 30 seconds
72 °C - 30 seconds
72 °C - 5

hold at 4 °C

components.data: Add 16.67 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP beads.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 16.67 uL of well-mixed AMPure XP beads.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 15 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at room temperature for 15 min.

components.data: Place on magnetic rack for at least 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place on magnetic rack for at least 5 min.

components.data: Repeat steps 91 and 92 one more time.
components.name: Description

components.data: Let the beads dry at room temperature for 2 min.
components.name: Description

components.data: Add 12 uL Resuspension Buffer and pipet up and down 10 times.
components.name: Description

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 2 min.
components.name: Description

components.data: Place in magnetic rack for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place in magnetic rack for 5 min.

components.data: Transfer 10 uL of the supernatant to a new 1.5 mL PCR tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 10 uL of the supernatant to a new 1.5 mL PCR tube.

components.data: Use 1 uL for qPCR quantiation (http://ethanomics.wordpress.com/ngs-qpcr-library-quantitation-protocol/) and run 1 uL on the Bioanalyzer.
components.name: Description
